name: Stars Beheaded
description:
Play as Jesse Diavol, a lost human trapped inside the demon realm trying to survive and find out what is going on,

Fight tons of enemies while trying to avoid the main characters from ripping the soul out of you!
Complete random puzzles to pass to the next stage.

Each main character has a different movement mechanic:

  • Maya will violently teleport towards you the angrier she gets.
  • Fable will run to the last position she heard the player in then she will constantly retrace her steps hoping the player gets in her way.
  • Redeye will slowly walk towards you and he might try cutting off your path.

However there is s̸o̶m̷e̵t̶h̵i̴n̸g̴ behind this strange phenomenon, perhaps it's all a strange nightmare or Jesse's try at escaping whatever e̶n̴d̵l̵e̶s̴s̷ ċ̵̦y̸̳͛c̴̫̋l̵̦͘e̸̝̅ ̷̩͐ŏ̴̖f̸̪͗ ̵̻͑d̸̺̰̝͗̾̃e̶̹̙̎̉̎̈́̈ä̸̧̮̆͠ͅt̸̨͚̥̦͔̍̎̔ẖ̷̈́̔̏͝͠ ̴̪̠̱̍a̷͉̯͚͝n̶͓̥̔̾d̷̹̤̥̄͒̌̓̕͜ t̵̰͊͊̀̑́ọ̷̧͈͖͍̄̋̾̋͑͛̽̚r̷̥̠̹̳̈́̏m̶͔̆̊͛̕̕e̸̛͇̝̰̣̞̺̐̀͗͂̾ͅn̸̟͉̯̻̋̄̽̈́̾͒͘t̵͍̻̠̜̗̐ ̸̩̿̅̈́̐̔̈̕͘ ̶̯̀̆̽͆̎o̶̡͚̜͆̋͗͝ņ̶̗͔̤͒͑̾͜l̴͕̹̝͗͗̉͌ỹ̶̖͎ ̸̜̰̹͈̪̏͌̓̄̈t̷̨̼̟̹͕͂̂͝o̴̠͚͋͐̾ ̷̛͖͈͋́̀̅b̵͇͈̼͖̬͂̑ḙ̴̡̖̲͓̓ ̸͇̝͕͐̀̚f̵̨̰̖͓̼͋r̶̢̺͔̺̀̕è̸͚̘͂͝ĕ̴̳̫͍̀d̶͓͝ ̸̺̔͆w̷̞̙̫̱̾̀h̴̟͖̯̓e̴̩͗̈́̇͑̐n̸͇̝͓̳̄̚͠ ̸̨̦̠͙̋̍̃͑́f̸̨̗̳̌̈̋a̸̢͇͎̘͚̓̒̓̍͆t̵̨̊͂̄͆e̴̝̩̦̽̄ ̵̞̤͇͈̟̀̊d̴̩͎̲̝́͑̽̽͝ͅe̵̯̅͊͛c̷͇̆ị̷͓̏̓͑d̷͔̃ë̴̗̿̅ͅͅs̴̨̺͙̈́̀̓ ̶̰̖̱̤̀̆̕ȋ̷͓͇̯̜͎̽̎ţ̷̳̹̈́'̴͉͓͔͚͊̍̂̕s̴̖̥̭͕͐̊̏̈ ̴̤̘̀̉͌ţ̴͉̻̞̣͌̌́͝i̵̫͕̫̽̕͘͝m̷̗̻̎͌ę̸̪̍̑͐e he's inside of.

Whatever it is it will all be over soon..
